solution_line_template: He increased his speed by {original_speed}*{speed_increase_percent_decimal}={speed_increase_amount_percent} mph
So his new speed was {original_speed}+{speed_increase_amount_percent}=<<{original_speed}+{speed_increase_amount_percent}={speed_after_supercharge}>>{speed_after_supercharge} mph

He increased it a further {additional_speed_increase} mph so his new speed is {speed_after_supercharge}+{additional_speed_increase}=<<{speed_after_supercharge}+{additional_speed_increase}={final_speed}>>{final_speed} mph
